title: Several year SHEIN customer
text: I have been using the SHEIN app for about 2-3 years now and for the most part I have loved it.  I place 1-2 orders a week.  The clothes are stylish, affordable and good quality.  I have always loved that they have more than just clothes.  I have found beautiful accessories, unique and helpful cookware, shoes and purses.  One of the bonuses that has keep me doing weekly orders is their point system.  When you review the products in your order you‚Äôd get 30 points per product. You can than use those points to discount your order. That was awesome as I saved my points to discount my shipping.  Last week the point system changed.  Now you will only get 15 points on reviews.  That is so disappointing that they cut review points by half.  Reviewing clothing items takes time and to only give you 15 points is ridiculous.  I now will be placing a lot less orders.

title: Please Read!
text: Relatively new to online shopping, I purchased SHEIN, thinking it would be a great app after hearing a few good things about it. I was scrolling through the different pages, instantly surprised that the cute clothes came at such a great price. But then I started hearing bad things about the app from friends, online reviews, etc. People were saying the customer service was horrible and I started to notice that SHEIN stole some of their items from other stores. I then deleted the app, and now SHEIN still sends me notifications. The notifications will say ‚ÄúLooks like you missed something!‚Äù or ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs a new deal!‚Äù Yet, I deleted the app MONTHS ago. It‚Äôs getting quite annoying. I never ordered anything from SHEIN, because I don‚Äôt feel as though I can trust the app. It seems too shady. If you‚Äôre looking for a great app with better clothes, then check out ZAFUL. SHEIN and ROMWE seem to be the same company. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this app. I am not trying to sound like a Karen, I just don‚Äôt appreciate this app.

title: Why SHEIN is the best online shopping app
text: Guys, shein is literally my favorite ever! The prices are SOO reasonable and cheap and the clothes are good quality and almost always true to size it depends on the fabric. The jewelry is good quality as long as u take care of it it‚Äôll last u a while, it doesn‚Äôt rust fast or turn ur ears, neck, wrist or finger green which most online jewelry does. The home decor is sooooo cute y‚Äôall like im in love with my bedding that i got from Shein. Last but not least the make up tools from shein are SUPER SUPER HIGH QUALITY!! I‚Äôm in love w the brush set that i got and it was a 32 piece set for like $12 üò± like literally! and i got some lashes that were like 6 for $3 and their so flattering i love and they don‚Äôt just have stuff for girls they have a men‚Äôs section too! u can get ur man a nice belt or shirt for his birthday or the holidays! i absolutely would recommend!!

title: My favorite place to order online
text: We absolutely love SHEIN. The prices simply cannot be beat anywhere else. I‚Äôm so glad I started ordering more than just clothes. So many people forget about all of the other beauty products, home items and even office supplies they carry. Every single item we have ordered has been great quality, looked just like the picture portrayed, and always warranted many compliments. I have three daughters and we also buy all our swimsuits from SHEIN. We get so many compliments at the beach each year. As affordable as it is, we are able to get about 5 swimsuits at SHEIN for the price of 1 anywhere else. I also really enjoy checking out the flash sale everyday. There is always some great items to fit any shopping list!

title: reviews are final!
text:
beware. if you try to leave a review on the clothes you buy it is a TERRIBLE process and is a pain every time. You have to review everything you bought in that cart all at once. And if you want all the points for reviews you better have all the photos and information ready! And lord forbid you accidentally leave the page just for a second while you‚Äôre leaving a review! All your hard progress on all of those reviews are gone. 

And once you finally got your review done you can not go back and edit them after you post them! How unfair and disappointing that is! And if you want to post the review for the clothes descriptions and post photos later, NOPE. Can not do that either. Incredibly disappointed in this part on shein. Do better. This is a simple fix that would help everyone !! No excuses on why it should be this bad.

title: Great choices and prices
text:
I don‚Äôt mind that the clothes don‚Äôt last as long for the kiddos, because yes some of them are a bit on the thinner end, however, when it comes to kids, cheap is priority and then variety. They‚Äôll grow out of it in no time anyway, so it lasting more than a few washes, is like excellent for me. I‚Äôve never had a SHEIN item not last yet. I have a toddler who grows like a weed, and she‚Äôs been just fine with all her clothes lasting. 

Now, my biggest issue with SHEIN is the design of the app. It‚Äôs too busy for me. I like simple and not overwhelming. 

Other than that I would 100% recommend and continue to use SHEIN. I love shopping on it and turn around time is about a week and a half. I can deal with that when I can‚Äôt find these things in the store. I like her looking like a little model for photo shoots.

title: I love SHEIN üíñ
text: SHEIN is one of my favorite places to shop, and it‚Äôs all for a reasonable price. title: Awesome! Just needs some improvement.
text: SHEIN is a really good app. But before you download it, there‚Äôs some things that you need to know. First of all, I just want to say, if your getting clothes, DOUBLE CHECK THE SIZE. This happed to me, and even though I orders each piece of clothing the same way, they all came in different sizes. Also make sure to check the piece of clothing it self. I ordered this one shirt, and the logo came on the back. But other than that the app is amazing! But there is just one more thing that‚Äôs important. SHEIN is a company established in China, so your going to need to order your things at least a month early. For example, I ordered my clothes around the beginning of this one month, ( can‚Äôt remember which üíÄ) and it came two months later. But like I said, besides that, great job! SHIEN is a great app with trendy clothes!

title: It has it‚Äôs good and bad
text: I personal shop in here all the time but I end up reselling everything because I can not stand the Cheap silky material they use, especially on biker shorts and T-shirts. When you order stuff like that you expect for it to be cotton or at least soft/breathable material. BUT I will say that they have VERY nice items. Considering I‚Äôve spent over $3000 on SHEIN clothes I know what to expect from most items. I don‚Äôt buy shirts, I stick with jeans and home items/accessories. I have found a few awesome shirts but you have to be able to tell that they can‚Äôt take the material with the fake silky stuff. Sizes are normally true to size but make sure you read the reviews, if there aren‚Äôt any reviews yet on new items DO NOT BUY IT. I‚Äôd also say If there‚Äôs no picture reviews don‚Äôt buy it because you need to see and make sure the items are same as pictured. Overall I give it 3 stars because it really just depends on what you get.

title: Love SHEIN!
text:
Take and save your measurements in your private account. Find clothes that will fit your body based on the size chart and customer reviews. I‚Äôm super tall and have a long torso and legs. It‚Äôs so hard for me to find clothes that fit properly. Using the measurement guide and reviews has helped me find clothes that fit MY BODY TYPE! It‚Äôs amazing. Customers have the option to post photos and show their measurements.  This is so helpful! Everything...I mean everything I‚Äôve ordered has fit me.  The prices are UNBEATABLE and free returns! Hello, amazing! 
If you post a review (how it looks on you, quality of fabric, likes and dislikes) you earn SHEIN points, if you post with a photo, you earn double points! Seeing how clothing fits others, helps me decide what size to order. Points are equivalent to store credit. Great job, SHEIN. Shipping is fast, too.

title: What you expect, mostly.
text: The first few times I ordered from Shein, I hated everything nothing fix etc. After my friends started ordering they said I need to look at reviews on each item and then decide. I started doing that and I have had good clothes ever since. Obviously, it isnt like a hundred dollar quality, but a lot of it is decent or you can even alter it yourself with glue or sewing. I mean you probably bought it for $6 anyway. They have CUTE items for cheap and i can always find what Im looking for, as I am a shopper who pictures something in her head then needs to find it even though it probably don‚Äôt exist üòÇ It also allows me to branch out into things that arent my usual my style for a cheap price. I try to limit myself to $60 at a time and get coupons, etc. so my orders of like 4-7 items can come out to $60 give or take, plus $50 is free shipping.

title: Beautiful clothes at AMAZING prices!
text: SheIn has simply beautiful & often unique clothing. And you literally cannot beat the prices! If you live in the US, & you don‚Äôt mind waiting a few extra days, you can literally fill your closet on a tiny budget! While I agree that sometimes the clothes aren‚Äôt that well made, what do you expect for a $7 dress? The fit has never been an issue for me. I order the same size as I would at any US store, & it‚Äôs almost always absolutely a great fit! Only once did I order an item that was way too small. Knowing that they have a great return policy, I was set to return it, but was disappointed that you can‚Äôt return PJ‚Äôs? But again, I‚Äôm out $9 for that. And the gorgeous dresses I‚Äôve ordered, more than make up for that! Easy to use app, & awesome products. I‚Äôm very glad I discovered it!

title: Horrible customer service
text: For a while, I bought a lot of clothes from this app. One thing that I bought, a belt, said that it was one size fits all, and when I received it I couldn‚Äôt even get it through the first hole, it was so tight. I‚Äôm only a medium, so there‚Äôs no reason that a one size fits all should be that small, and I don‚Äôt see how anyone else could fit it either. The review that I left reflected my opinion on this, and when I looked a few days later, it said my review had been denied. I was very concerned about this, because I noticed that the only reviews that were left on this item (and any item, actually) were all positive, 3 stars and above. That‚Äôs not okay, and that‚Äôs not honest. I submitted a ticket to ask why this had happened, hoping to get some sort of legitimate response. When I came back the next day to look and see if I had gotten a response yet, my ticket had been closed and said ‚Äúresolved.‚Äù I never got any response and the issue was never resolved. Terrible. They don‚Äôt care about their customers.

title: I love shein and it is my favorite shopping app!!
text: Almost all of the clothes and accessories I wear and own are from shein. They are very affordable and great quality. You have to check the reviews on each product tho to see how it will fit you and if it‚Äôs a good product or not but out of the hundreds of things I‚Äôve ordered, I‚Äôve only had 2 things I was unhappy with. I‚Äôve spent almost 1000$ on shein alone within the past 2 years and they have free fast shipping. Everything usually comes in within 2 weeks unless you order around Christmas. Even then, I ordered a few things on Christmas Eve and they are coming in around the beginning of January. ( I didn‚Äôt meet the minimum requirement for free shipping so I had to pay 4$, which isn‚Äôt bad)

title: Absolutely love shein
text: I love shein! I swear by it. I really haven‚Äôt ordered from any other website since I found shein. I love that they give reviews and there are even photos in those reviews so it helps in finding your correct size. title: DON‚ÄôT ORDER FROM SHEIN
text: Shein uses child labor and does not properly pay its workers and is honestly just a fast fashion brand that needs to stop. title: SHEIN review
text: Honestly when I first ordered from SHEIN I was super excited it took a minute but when I received my first package LET ME TELL YOU it was exactly what I expected and bought from SHEIN it was good quality for me and ever since then I‚Äôve been ordering from SHEIN it‚Äôs honestly like my go to store lol I love all the coupons and free delivery and steals and deals they have which is AMAZING the only thing is is that let‚Äôs say you ordered 10 items only and they were cheap items such as $1 $5 somewhere between that range and you order and your total is around 100 buck smh wish they taxes weren‚Äôt so high and I‚Äôve had to pay for shipping plus taxes and I hate like I would buy something for $1 like two things and it‚Äôs already an arm and a leg LOL man but all nd all it‚Äôs a eh app tbh

title: ‚ÄúCustomer service‚Äù is useless
text: IF ANYBODY SEES THIS REVIEW AND IS HAVING THE SAME PROBLEM AS ME, FILE A COMPLAINT WITH THE BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU. I loved this company because they‚Äôre cheap and the clothes are cute but I‚Äôm never buying from them again unless I get some real help. They basically stole $152 from me. I ordered from SHEIN over a month ago and received an email saying my order has shipped. Since then I haven‚Äôt heard anything else about it. So I tried talking to customer service and the robot keeps telling me to either submit a support ticket or live chat with someone between 9am and 3am. I can‚Äôt cancel because supposedly it‚Äôs already been sent, and I can‚Äôt return it because I haven‚Äôt even received it. There‚Äôs nothing I can do it this point so I‚Äôm basically screwed.

title: Gave up...

title: This app is the best! ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©
text: My friend just introduced SHEIN to me and a started using their website. Best decision ever! I got a bunch of cute tops for only $30! I started to find my style and it was super cheap! title: My thoughts

title: Affordable and Cute Clothes!!
text: I was really kind of skeptical when my friend suggested SHEIN to me as an option for affordable clothes. I buy them a lot for work because my office is business casual, but when I was spending tons of money on work clothes they'd always rip after a couple weeks or they didn't fit right. Because the clothes on SHEIN are much more affordable, I've bought tons of clothes (work and casual clothes) and nothing has ripped or torn since I bought them! The only critique I have about SHEIN is that their clothes are not always consistent among the sizes. Pay close attention to their measurements for each size and buy accordingly, DON'T trust the size indicator alone. Know your measurements and buy accordingly, you'll never be disappointed!! :-) I love SHEIN!!!

title: My go to place to shop!
text: Ever since my first order I‚Äôve been hooked! I have probably purchased over $100 worth of clothes (which is like 11-20 items) 5 separate times. I check in every morning to gain points for $ off of my purchases. I like that they give you points for clothing reviews and more points for pictures. The only flaw is it seems like reviews aren‚Äôt monitored so I have noticed reviews for clothes on the wrong item, for example ‚Äúthe sleeves are nice and long‚Äù would be on a sleeveless shirt. title: Cheap
text: Bought my gf 5 anklets. Took 3 weeks to get here but that isnt the issue i was expecting it to take longer since the tracking number said it would be delivered on july 1st. Go check my mail june 17th and its in there. But anyway like i said i ordered 5 anklets. FIVE! Out of those 5, 1 anklet was a butterfly with blue wings. One of the wings was off when we opened the package so i had to super glue it back on. 1 anklet broke the first day she wore it. What were we doing that day you may ask? We were driving around for 2-3 hours looking at houses. We NEVER got out the car. How does it break by her just sitting in the passenger seat ? 2 days later she decides to try another anklet. Well that anklet breaks as shes putting it on. So now she only has 2 left. Well she puts one on and goes about her day. Comes home and tells me ‚Äúyea this one broke too.‚Äù So now im gonna assume that this last one hasnt broke because she hasnt worn it yet. I would rate this app a 0 if i could. Ik this stuff was cheap but i didnt know it was 25¬¢ jewelry out of a bubble gum machine cheap.

title: A+++++++

title: Really pretty good
text: I have actually grown to love SHEIN more than I thought I would. Everything is affordable (which is a must for a girl just trying to pay of her car and then pay for repairs) and most things I‚Äôve gotten are good quality. Many have felt like SHEIN steals money and gives low quality products. The tips that have helped me be successful is Read the reviews before you buy, and don‚Äôt go with your usual size, check the inches and measurement of each product. Know the inches of your own body. I haven‚Äôt had issues with sizing etc when I do that. I have ordered shirts in Extra  small, medium, XXL, L. But they all fit correctly because I looked at the product measurements. They have such a variety of clothes and I now have a whole wardrobe I enjoy wearing and get many compliments on. Thanks SHEIN!

title: Easy to use, cute clothes on a budget
text: I love going on this app. It has almost everything from accessories, bathing suites, shoes to home & living products. Right now I‚Äôm picking out some fake flowers for my mother in law while trying to find the perfect bathing suit for myself. She ended up downloading the app as well. I‚Äôve used SHEIN for about 5 years now & I‚Äôve never had a problem with it. Only thing I will say is I‚Äôve had to send a total of 4 items back the entire time I‚Äôve used it because it‚Äôs either too big or too small. Make sure you read the reviews to help you with getting the most accurate size according to your measurements. Other than that Shein has been helping me turn my worn out clothes into head turning outfits. Love it!

title: I üíó  ‚ú®SHEIN‚ú®
text: I shop on SHEIN all the time. Mostly everything fits and they have soooo many styles of clothing and accessories. It‚Äôs also cheaper than most online or clothing stores. Also it‚Äôs super helpful that you can look at reviews just below the item, there are recommendations too, all of this is super helpful there are so many categories of things you can buy for cheap prices and they have some very cute clothes and the most random things you might need for cheap. There are soooo many opportunities to earn coupons to save even more money!! Most of the material they use is nice and not see-through. My favorite thing about SHEIN is the cheap prices and the quality/style of the clothing. I think I explained why you need to download SHEIN pretty well soo yeah.

title: Surprisingly good!
text: I was skeptical at first sight of this app. I seen it on ads while on Facebook and on the internet. I soon saw there was an app, I downloaded the app and became even more intrigued. Finally I decided to order a few things. A tee shirt type of dress and two chokers and received my order about a week later. Surprisingly, the material of the dress was different then what I expected but, it wasn‚Äôt bad it was actually BETTER than my expectations! The chokers were of course nice as well. I‚Äôm highly satisfied and ready to order from here very often from now on. Definitely suggest going by the reviews for any item because the customer who have already ordered the item your looking to purchase don‚Äôt lie. You can make a good judgment from other customer and their reviews.

title: Feedback
text: With the current pandemic that we are living in I feel like your company is vastly growing. You are getting new costumers daily. And you are being sponsored on social media without the person being paid. I personally believe the clothes and price are fabulous, but you know what else would be fabulous to include in your app? Provide trending music on the app. What I mean is that while the costumer is shopping online they are also listening to music as if they were in the store shopping. How do you think that would change your app? Like I said before, we are in a pandemic not many of us can leave our homes or if we can when we go to the stores the racks are half empty. So, why not make your online shoppers feel as if they were at the store by providing music just like they would listen if they were physically at a store.

title: Love/hate
text: Love the items but this was my second time ordering and my order hasn‚Äôt been delivered even though it says it has been delivered and I‚Äôve done everything I was supposed to do you like check with the neighbors go to UPS and asked and nothing! I‚Äôve issued multiple tickets no response I‚Äôve tried calling and he keeps on  saying I can‚Äôt call at this moment and it‚Äôs very irritating because I‚Äôve ordered these products because I needed them for a special occasion and it‚Äôs devastating that a company I trusted isn‚Äôt answering my questions are providing help. The first time I‚Äôve ordered everything went great when I track my order I had said that my items that were delivered in the mailbox when I checked the mailbox they were there. This time with this purchase it said that my items were delivered at home went to an individual I was home all day didn‚Äôt go out at all and nothing was ever delivered. I bought my items or a complete refund!

title: Great stuff but you need to know what your getting
text:
I love shein, I have a lot of stuff from here and I‚Äôve been happy with it. However, I have three major qualms about the app and cooperation itself. The brand/clothes however are great

1, the production system. Shein is a fast fashion brand, so it rises and falls with trends so it‚Äôs horrible for the environment because of all the clothes being tossed. Not to mention the manufacturing chains they buy from don‚Äôt pay the workers well. So don‚Äôt buy in bulk. (REVIEWS ARE EVERYTHING, THEY SHOULD BE YOUR MAKE OR BREAK!)

2, there‚Äôs no way to organize your wishlist. I have ocd tendencies so this might not be an issue for everyone, but I can‚Äôt sort my wishlist, or even make sections for everything (season, style, event, etc) they do have boards, but it is a half hearted attempt.

3, this might be me being dumb, but I can‚Äôt share the wishlist. I‚Äôm a teen, so for Christmas/events, I normally send wishlists if I‚Äôm asked what I want. I can‚Äôt do that on the app so it‚Äôs super annoying. I can share specific clothes though. Doesn‚Äôt make much sense.

Overall I love it and it‚Äôs great for the seasonal stuff, just don‚Äôt buy in bulk and beware that you get what you pay for!

title: Get it together!!!
text: I‚Äôve gotten 2 orders from this app and i loved everything from them, but before i order again i leave the stuff i know i want to get next time in my checkout bag. Most of the time (which is like everyday), the stuff that i have in my bag is still there, but recently Shein keeps removing the items even when they‚Äôre hot and it keeps saying ‚ÄúThis product doesn‚Äôt exist‚Äù when i go to click on it because i can still see the item and ‚ÄúThere is something wrong with our sever. We are trying to fix it. Please try again later‚Äù and i‚Äôve been trying ‚Äúagain later‚Äù for the last 4 days + it keeps randomly taking things out of my bag even when they‚Äôre in stock. I love Shein, but if it‚Äôs going to keep removing the good items and randomly taking things out of my bag, they‚Äôll lose many customers and rightfully so.

title: Great prices! Fastest delivery!
text: I stumbled upon Shein in an ad. I decided to try it out. I ordered a couple of things first I know that there are other companies out there that take forever for the items to be delivered. Not Shein! They actually tell you that it will take about three weeks give or take a couple of days. You know how it feels to wait for that package to arrive? The anticipation? Well this website normally delivers within a week or so! And their prices are extremely affordable! I will always shop through this website! As a matter of fact I snagged myself some end of season deals on bathing suits. Five dollars for a three-piece set. $3.51 for a bathing suit top. Their jewelry is phenomenal as well if you like your cosmetic jewelry to match your outfits like I do, you won't be disappointed!!!

title: If your looking for balling on a budget this is your site
text: I found out about SHEIN a few months ago and I am obsessed!! Just be careful because you will become addicted to shopping here. With new things added everyday and constant sales I don‚Äôt shop anywhere else. They are always expanding their inventory and always new things for great prices. Make sure you read the sizing. But I haven‚Äôt gotten one thing that doesn‚Äôt look like the pictures and reviews tell everything I am one who reads reviews before I buy and I haven‚Äôt had problems. Shipping is well done especially with everything going on they are taking precautions. But they get it to you as soon as possible. Can‚Äôt wait to keep shopping!! They also have kids and mens and workout and home everything.

title: Plus Size For Less
text:
SHEIN has a nice selection of plus size clothing for less. Most things are good quality, although some plus sized tops don‚Äôt have the seams adjusted quite right, so that there is more fabric to the back and less toward the front. This means that if you have a larger chest, it ends up right on the front, pulling under the arm and lose in the back. However, that has only been the case with structured shirts, not tee shirts.  For reference, I am a size 18, with 40F chest. 2X or 3X typically fits without being clingy.

Their home items seem nice as well. One inspirational poster I ordered without a frame, arrived properly rolled, but was bound with a tight rubber and that left a sharp crease. Hoping to steam it out without melting the ink or making it run.

At the price points, you still get more than you paid for, in general.

title: Worth It
text: I‚Äôve been shopping on shein for years and it‚Äôs saved me so much money. Yes, it‚Äôs cheap and the quality is like top brands, but it‚Äôs not downright awful. You get what you pay for. Some of their clothing can run small, but returns in the US are free so I just return/exchange anything that ends up not fitting which has only been two or three things. I‚Äôve spent over $200 on shein and will spend lots more. Shein, Romwe, and Zaful are all one in the same; they‚Äôre all owned by the same company so many of their things are the same. I still buy usually from shein since that‚Äôs what I‚Äôm used to. Most things are under $25 and they always have flash sales so really you can‚Äôt go wrong. Plus, points are easy to earn from daily check ins to writing reviews. 10/10 always recommend to friends!!

title: I love shein!
text: I absolutely love their clothes. Every now and then you might get something not good quality, but you get what you pay for. It‚Äôs a  cheaper priced online store, compared to a high end store in the mall. You can definitely shop there and always stay in budget. They have so really nice dupes that you may see in other stores, but get them from shein at a better price, which is a plus in my book. I am always on their website. A lot of the stuff run out really fast so if you see, and like it, just get. The only sad thing I have to say is I, don‚Äôt see my shoe size quite often. Which is a size 10.(might need an 11 if they run small) Their shoes are so cute but I never see my size. Not sure if they are running out, or just don‚Äôt carry that the size, but I don‚Äôt see them.

title: ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
text: This was my first time buying from SHEIN and I have to say my experience was great. I received one pair of pants before the others because they were being shipped from somewhere else, which was fine. I was always being notified about the progress of my shipments. They were easy to track. Altogether I bought 12 items for only $165. They were all there. I had 2 that weren‚Äôt the quality I would have liked, but nothing that would keep me from wearing them. They remain the same quality even after washing and drying. One shirt shrunk a little, but not too much, it‚Äôs just that type of fabric. The prices were AMAZING. The whole experience was awesome and I will continue to shop and refer others to shop with SHEIN!!!

title: Coming from a more muscular woman
text: As someone who is currently between a size 10 and 12 in US clothing sizes in different brands because of my thick frame and muscle, I found it severely disappointing that in a lot of their listings they believe a US size 12- their largest size for normal sized clothing- has no more than 35 inches for the bust and/or hips. And for some really AMAZINGLY cute garments on their site, it breaks my heart to see that the difference in measurements between small and large is only 3 inches, one inch inbetween each size. That doesnt sound very diverse or inclusive, doesnt it? Nevertheless I did buy at least 5 clothing choices (4 of them being plus size, even though I dont really have the kind of curves that plus size clothing gives room for) because it is affordable and everything is the kind of lovely and cute that you wont find in other well known brands and stores. Currently awaiting the day that they come in the mail

title: Unethical, wasteful, and harmful.
text: If you haven‚Äôt looked into all of the information about this company, now is better a time than ever. They are mass producers, and one of the biggest waste producing companies in the world. They steal designs from small businesses, artists, and designers. Shein is a huge attribution to child labor problems in 3rd world countries. It all sounds severely far fetched but if you do your research I promise you that you‚Äôll find all of this to be true. Most importantly out of all of this, Shein often times doesn‚Äôt pay (or SEVERLY) underpays workers and creates massive standards for production (such as 1K NEW ITEMS DAILY). Just because it‚Äôs cheap doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs okay. I, out of anybody, understand wanting to shop cheap because retail is expensive and the cost of living is high. But shopping from a company is more harm than the cheap price tag, trust me. I have started purchasing all or most clothes secondhand, whether that be from an online secondhand retailer or a thrift store.
